verses.verse: Now when Abram <WH87> was ninety-nine years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to Abram <WH87> and said <WH559> to him, "I am God <WH410> Almighty; <WH7706> Walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> Me, and be blameless. <WH8549>
"And I will establish <WH5414> My covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> Me and you, And I will multiply <WH7235> you exceedingly. <WH3966>"
And Abram <WH87> fell <WH5307> on his face, <WH6440> and God <WH430> talked <WH1696> with him, saying, <WH559>
"As for Me, behold, <WH2009> My covenant <WH1285> is with you, And you shall be the father of a multitude <WH1> of nations. <WH1995>

"No <WH3808> longer <WH5750> shall your name <WH8034> be called <WH7121> Abram, <WH87> But your name <WH8034> shall be Abraham; <WH85> For I will make <WH5414> you the father of a multitude <WH1> of nations. <WH1995>
"And I will make <WH6509> you exceedingly <WH3966> fruitful, <WH6509> and I will make <WH5414> nations <WH1471> of you, and kings <WH4428> shall come <WH3318> forth <WH3318> from you.

"And I will establish <WH6965> My covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> Me and you and your descendants <WH2233> after <WH310> you throughout their generations <WH1755> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285> to be God <WH430> to you and to your descendants <WH2233> after <WH310> you.

"And I will give <WH5414> to you and to your descendants <WH2233> after <WH310> you, the land <WH776> of your sojournings, <WH4033> all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> for an everlasting <WH5769> possession; <WH272> and I will be their God. <WH430>"

God <WH430> said <WH559> further to Abraham, <WH85> "Now as for you, you shall keep <WH8104> My covenant, <WH1285> you and your descendants <WH2233> after <WH310> you throughout their generations. <WH1755>

"This <WH2088> is My covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> you shall keep, <WH8104> between <WH996> Me and you and your descendants <WH2233> after <WH310> you: every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among you shall be circumcised. <WH4135>
"And you shall be circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of your foreskin; <WH6190> and it shall be the sign <WH226> of the covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> Me and you.

"And every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among you who is eight <WH8083> days <WH3117> old <WH1121> shall be circumcised <WH4135> throughout your generations, <WH1755> a [servant] who <WH3211> is born <WH3211> in the house <WH1004> or who <WH4736> is bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> from any <WH3605> foreigner, <WH1121> <WH5236> who <WH834> is not of your descendants. <WH2233>

"A [servant] who <WH3211> is born <WH3211> in your house <WH1004> or who <WH4736> is bought <WH4736> with your money <WH3701> shall surely <WH4135> be circumcised; <WH4135> thus shall My covenant <WH1285> be in your flesh <WH1320> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant. <WH1285>

"But an uncircumcised <WH6189> male <WH2145> who <WH834> is not circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin, <WH6190> that person <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off <WH3772> from his people; <WH9415> he has broken <WH6565> My covenant. <WH1285>"

Then God <WH430> said <WH559> to Abraham, <WH85> "As for Sarai <WH8297> your wife, <WH802> you shall not call <WH7121> her name <WH8034> Sarai, <WH8297> but Sarah <WH8283> [shall be] her name. <WH8034>

"And I will bless <WH1288> her, and indeed <WH1571> I will give <WH5414> you a son <WH1121> by her. Then I will bless <WH1288> her, and she shall be [a mother of] nations; <WH1471> kings <WH4428> of peoples <WH5971> shall come <WH1961> from her."

Then Abraham <WH85> fell <WH5307> on his face <WH6440> and laughed, <WH6711> and said <WH559> in his heart, <WH3820> "Will a child be born <WH3205> to a man <WH1121> one hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>? And will Sarah, <WH8283> who is ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old, <WH1323> bear <WH3205> [a child?]"
And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> "Oh <WH3863> that Ishmael <WH3458> might live <WH2421> before <WH6440> Thee!"

But God <WH430> said, <WH559> "No, <WH61> but Sarah <WH8283> your wife <WH802> shall bear <WH3205> you a son, <WH1121> and you shall call <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Isaac; <WH3327> and I will establish <WH6965> My covenant <WH1285> with him for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> for his descendants <WH2233> after <WH310> him.

"And as for Ishmael, <WH3458> I have heard <WH8085> you; behold, <WH2009> I will bless <WH1288> him, and will make <WH6509> him fruitful, <WH6509> and will multiply <WH7235> him exceedingly. <WH3966> He shall become <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> princes, <WH5387> and I will make <WH5414> him a great <WH1419> nation. <WH1471>
"But My covenant <WH1285> I will establish <WH6965> with Isaac, <WH3327> whom <WH834> Sarah <WH8283> will bear <WH3205> to you at this <WH2088> season <WH4150> next <WH312> year. <WH8141>"
And when He finished <WH3615> talking <WH1696> with him, God <WH430> went <WH5927> up from Abraham. <WH85>

Then Abraham <WH85> took <WH3947> Ishmael <WH3458> his son, <WH1121> and all <WH3605> [the servants] who <WH3211> were born <WH3211> in his house <WH1004> and all <WH3605> who <WH4736> were bought <WH4736> with his money, <WH3701> every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among the men <WH376> of Abraham's household, <WH1004> and circumcised <WH4135> the flesh <WH1320> of their foreskin <WH6190> in the very <WH6106> same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> as God <WH430> had said <WH1696> to him.
Now Abraham <WH85> was ninety-nine years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he was circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin. <WH6190>
And Ishmael <WH3458> his son <WH1121> was thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he was circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin. <WH6190>
In the very <WH6106> same <WH6106> day <WH3117> Abraham <WH85> was circumcised, <WH4135> and Ishmael <WH3458> his son. <WH1121>

And all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of his household, <WH1004> who <WH3211> were born <WH3211> in the house <WH1004> or bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> from a foreigner, <WH1121> <WH5236> were circumcised <WH4135> with him.
